website_summaries.verdict: Great as a refresher. Easy-to-understand drills to help you focus on specific areas.
pros: Provides an option for quick review as well as more detailed study options and practice tests
Provides strategies for studying and test-taking to help you save time
Especially helpful for those taking ACT for first time and who need initial guidance
cons: Online materials are a little confusing to use
Not great for those seeking score improvement

customer_reviews.title: Scholarships for us... thanks to this review.
customer_reviews.text: Well, my daughter studied for six weeks- using this book- and earned a 33. So I’m very pleased. The key is to take the practice tests in the amount of time the real tests do. Don’t just know the material. It’s all about pacing yourself and knowing what to expect on the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: maple leaf

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my stepson to help him raise his test score. When he uses it, he has done better on the practice tests. We are waiting for his upcoming test date to see how big of a difference they made for him. From a parental standpoint the books are super user friendly and informative. Wish I would have bought them earlier.
customer_reviews.author: MellyMel

customer_reviews.title: Helpful, easier to read
customer_reviews.text: This is a readable book with good advice and witt. My daughter isn't overwhelmed as much as others we tried. Good practice tests.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: My oldest son used this to take the ACT this summer. He had just finished his freshman year. The material covered was really good and useful. The online practice tests were a good indicator of what he would see on the actual test. We will use the included paper tests this year when he takes it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett Ogden

customer_reviews.title: It Worked For Us
customer_reviews.text: My niece improved her composite score 2 points after using this book. Anything over a 1 pont improvement is considered significant for the ACT. So, I would say it is well worth the price! In order for it to work, it takes considerable time and effort. I would recommend 2 to 4 weeks of intense practice using it if a score improvement is desired.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good information.
customer_reviews.text: Good information. My son loves it! I also read some of it. I think it’s full of good information. (I have a J. D. And Ph.D)
customer_reviews.author: Darvin

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't very helpful and didn't hold my teens attention whatsoever. I wouldn't recommend nor would I purchase again. This is a huge book but a lot of it is common sense and just filler words, I don't believe it helped my son prepare as much as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Kitena Suttles

customer_reviews.title: Saved me a lot of stress
customer_reviews.text: The ACT gave me nightmares but this book definitely made my life easier with the practice tests and the tips and tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed A.

customer_reviews.title: Package came damaged
customer_reviews.text: This came today and arrived damaged. It is supposed to be a brand new version and cover is bad shape.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ching

customer_reviews.title: Great guide
customer_reviews.text: Perfect study guide to familiarize yourself with test style and questions.
customer_reviews.author: John Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This ACT review book is very helpful to my daughter. She has already made some improvement on her practice test score since she started learning and practicing with this book. Will recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever! Recommend to every student I know
customer_reviews.text: Helped me score a 33! Definitely recommend to everybody who wants to improve their act score and get lots of practice
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this book to study for the ACT and it came completely soaked. won't be ordering again anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Smart

customer_reviews.title: Act strategies
customer_reviews.text: It was helpful in telling how the act is made up and gave me helpful strategies.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya Traylor

customer_reviews.title: Good hints and has tests and questions to practice.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this to help her study for the ACT. We will see what her score is but the book has hints and questions to prep you for the test.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great book must have
customer_reviews.text: Great book to study from it breaks down the act very well unlike my high school I went too
customer_reviews.author: GK4

customer_reviews.title: Not the test
customer_reviews.text: Just not what the tests are actually like. They have just thrown some questions they want to in there that are not on the test.
customer_reviews.author: Allen R. Leach

product_meta.title: Cracking the ACT with 6 Practice Tests, 2019 Edition: 6 Practice Tests + Content Review + Strategies (College Test Preparation)
